title: ASPS Case based Discussion Form
completedHtml: Thank you. The assessment form is now submitted. Please submit the Training requirement from the Training Requirement page.

elements.name: question3
elements.title: Clinical scenario
elements.commentText: other procedure or part of a procedure

elements.name: Overall rating panel
question10
elements.html:
•  Required frequent guidance - Trainee required frequent prompting, teaching and re-direction when discussing important aspects of the case.
  •  Required occasional guidance - Trainee required occasional prompting and teaching when discussing the case.
  •  Safe and competent - Trainee discussed the case thoroughly and responded well when questioned about rationale and potential scenarios.
  • Role model for others - Junior colleagues would learn from discussing cases with this trainee, can provide guidance to others.

elements.description: Consultant discusses the details of the case with the trainee, including how the trainee may have responded to alternate circumstances. Overall, which describes the competence of the trainee for this type of case?

elements.name: panel3
question4
elements.title: Clinical assessment and diagnostic skills
elements.description: Presents relevant aspects history and examination, discusses key features and demonstrates understanding of how they relate to diagnosis and plan, appropriate differential diagnosis, demonstrates comprehensive knowledge of likely injuries/conditions.

elements.name: question5
elements.title: Management plan
elements.description: Formulated plan specific to patient need, aware of evidence based approaches, appropriately weighed up advantages and disadvantages of alternatives.

elements.name: question1
elements.title: Clinical judgement and decision making
elements.description: Articulates rationale for decisions, demonstrates sound judgement based on thorough understanding of patient’s injury/condition and best possible outcome. Respond appropriately to ‘what if’ scenarios.

elements.name: question6
elements.title: Ability to reflect on experience
elements.description: Objectively reviews own performance, identifies opportunities for improvement, demonstrates insight to own limitations, responds well to potential complications, can suggest strategies to minimise issues in future cases.

elements.name: question7
elements.title: Teamwork and collaboration
elements.description: Willingly engages others to help when needed, demonstrates collaborative multidisciplinary approach to patient care.

elements.title: Specific feedback
elements.description: Consultant comments on what was done well and provide suggestions on how the trainee may improve. Not all boxes need to be completed.

elements.name: question8
elements.title: Trainee would benefit from observation and feedback on a similar case.
